titleStmt.title: Daniel W. Lindsey to William D. Kidd
CWG13960

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 10 ; 10 Feb - 16 March 1865

body.p:
404
March 13th 5
Wm D Kidd
Co I 26th Ky Infty.
Evansville Ind
Sir

Your letter of the 10th inst to his Excellency Gov Bramlette has been referred to this office. I have forwarded to the Surgeon General of Ky, your application for a transfer, with the request, if possible to effect it.

Very Respectfully
D, W, Lindsey
Adj Genl Ky

Kidd, William D.
Co. I. 26" Ky Infty.
To the Gov --
Asks to be transferred to Kentucky --
Respectfully referred to Dr J. W. Scott. Surg Genl of Ky, who will if practicable effect the transfer desired.

By order of the Govr
D. W. Lindsey
Adj Genl Ky
